description: This file defines a set of React components for rendering alert UI elements, including a main Alert component, and subcomponents AlertTitle and AlertDescription. It also includes styling configurations using class-variance-authority.

methods.name: Alert
methods.description: React component that renders an alert div with variant styling and forwarding ref.

methods.name: AlertTitle
methods.description: React component that renders the alert title with styling, forwarding ref.

methods.name: AlertDescription
methods.description: React component for alert description content with styling, forwarding ref.
